alert.note: Alert for Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 7:54PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pinellas County through 830 PM EDT... At 754 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West And East Lealman, or near Saint Petersburg, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clearwater, Largo, Pinellas Park, Seminole, Downtown Saint Petersburg, Saint Petersburg, St. Petersburg, St. Pete Beach, Bay Pines, South Highpoint, Harbor Bluffs, Gandy, Feather Sound, West And East Lealman, Ridgecrest, Gulfport, Treasure Island, Kenneth City, South Pasadena and Madeira Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
